title: It can only get better for Roger Federer from here, right?
shortContent: LONDON -- At the official launch party for the world's top eight players at the Houses of Parliament in London on Friday evening, Roger Federer joked he had been losing to everyone in practice. Maybe he saw some truth in the quip. If his first match at the ATP World Tour Finals...
